text: Clara Marina Brugada Molina (born August 12, 1963) is a Mexican politician who is the head of government of Mexico City since 2024. She is a member of Morena. She was the mayor of the borough of Iztapalapa from 2009 to 2012. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Heads of Government of Mexico City
title: Clara Brugada
